snippet.title: Bard's Tale gameplay (PC Game, 1985)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Bard's Tale (aka bard's tale 1: tales of the unknown), Dos PC game produced by Interplay in 1985 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/bard-s-tale/84/
It is a game in which you must choose some characters or create your and you will have some different battles.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Might and Magic 3: Isles of Terra - https://youtu.be/-E1ak1pXf24
Might and Magic: Clouds of Xeen - https://youtu.be/F4lUJAQd9v8
Dungeons and Dragons - https://youtu.be/5ETp4cqSX20
